title: Boasberg reverses course on Jan. 6 defendants pardoned by Trump
description: Boasberg reversed course on an earlier ruling involving high-dollar restitution payments, Jan. 6 defendants, and key separation of powers issues.
content:
U.S. District Judge James Boasberg on Wednesday ordered two Jan. 6 defendants pardoned by President Donald Trump
 to be refunded in full for restitution payments made and fines incurred as part of t… [+4465 chars]
